formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Ferrara is a top notch, caring dentist.  She is an absolute perfectionist, which is absolutely what you want for the health of your teeth. All of the work she has done is gorgeous and once it's done, it lasts (the quality is impeccable).  Also she is highly ethical.  She will only do work if you absolutely need it.  She is very responsive and has helped me when I had major dental emergencies no matter when I have contacted her.  She always fits me in at convenient times.  My family and I have gone to her for many years and I absolutely trust and recommend her.  You will not find a better dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. Ferrara is a great dentist! She is so gentle and talks you through any procedure you may have to undergo. My X-Rays were quick and easy and I didn't feel a thing when she worked on my teeth.  Very friendly and made me feel comfortable, I can't see myself going to another dentist.

text.text: Dr. Ferrara is a great dentist! She is so gentle and talks you through any procedure you may have to undergo. My X-Rays were quick and easy and I didn't feel a thing when she worked on my teeth.  Very friendly and made me feel comfortable, I can't see myself going to another dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. Ferrara has been my dentist for 17 years. She is the best dentist I have ever come across -- patient, friendly, professional, gentle, and caring. I used to be nervous going to the dentist, but I am not with Dr Ferrara. I always know I am in good hands and she will take the best care of me! I highly recommend her!

text.text: Dr. Ferrara has been my dentist for 17 years. She is the best dentist I have ever come across -- patient, friendly, professional, gentle, and caring. I used to be nervous going to the dentist, but I am not with Dr Ferrara. I always know I am in good hands and she will take the best care of me! I highly recommend her!

originalText.text: Dr. Anne is the most ethical, caring and upholds the highest standard of quality care a patient can ever receive from a dentist. My family and I have been her patients for over 20 years and we would never consider going elsewhere.  We gladly travel to NYC to her office and we are always greeted with a smiling face and excellent care and service.  Dr. Anne is a true professional and we love her dearly and you will too.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!!

originalText.text: Anne is the only dentist I trust in NYC. She is a true professional, dedicated to her craft and genuinely cares for her patients well-being. She will always be honest about your needs and takes care to go over all the options with her patients, including finances and working with your insurance. Run, don't walk, to Dr. Ferrara's office on Central Park South!
